description:
Super Sus is a companion app for the hit multiplayer game Among Us. The app provides useful resources to help you become a pro player, including:

• Strategy guides - Learn the best strategies for catching impostors and surviving as a crewmate or imposter. The guides cover things like alibi management, teamwork, and gameplay techniques.

• Crewmate tasks - Practice crucial tasks from the game to build speed and efficiency. This can help you complete tasks faster so you have more time to catch impostors.

• Imposter tactics - Brush up on common imposter tactics like vent kills, sliding, and more. Practice your imposter game to become a stealthy phantom.

• Roleplaying chat - Access a library of useful chat messages and acronyms you can use while playing to communicate effectively with your team.

• Statistics - Track your in-game stats like kills, deaths, tasks completed, meetings attended, and more. Use the data to identify strengths and weaknesses.

• Cheat sheets - Reference sheets with tasks, vents, common glitches, and other important information to have while playing.

• How to play guide - A guide for beginners to learn the basics of how Among Us works and how to win as a crewmate or imposter.

The Super Sus app is well designed, easy to use, and full of great resources to take your Among Us gameplay to the next level. Download it today to become a sus master!

Also read : Why is Among Us so popular?
